article.Heading: Cancellation of 17 taxes & 22 cesses will be helpful to the businessman: Nitin Gadkari
article.Summary: Watch Santosh Gangwar MoS, Finance, Nitin Gadkari Minister for Road Transport and Highways, Suresh Prabhu Railway Minister, Vanaja Sarna, CBEC Chief and Sushil Modi leader BJP share their views on the launch of Goods and Services Tax.
article.Body: Watch Santosh Gangwar MoS, Finance, Nitin Gadkari Minister for Road Transport and Highways, Suresh Prabhu Railway Minister, Vanaja Sarna, CBEC Chief and Sushil Modi leader BJP share their views on the launch of Goods and Services Tax.
